content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access On-premises Gateway Version 1.0.43 June 3, 2024—ZTSA On-Premises Gateway Version 1.0.43 provides enhanced security and connectivity features. This update includes the following changes: New feature IP Address groups can now be used in on-premise gateways. This allows the bypassing of authentication and bandwidth controls. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
